message.body: I need a mindfulness exercise ASAP! I'm about to try my first horse and I am soooo nervous that I will suck at riding it.
Are you standing up? How do the bottoms of your feet feel on the ground? Press them down. Rock a little weight forward, then back, then find the middle. Breathe deep!!
Good luck, I wanna hear about it later! :) also, inhale, lengthen the back of your neck, exhale, belly draws in, shoulders way down
